K12bsu050_u:4: ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma gṛdhrakūṭe parvate mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ dvādaśasāhasrapañcaśatairbodhisattvakoṭiniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ viharati sma,
K12bsu050_u:5: lokapālādidevakoṭiniyutasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ śrīsiṃhāsane viharati sma //
K12bsu050_u:6: atha khalu bodhisattvo mahāsattvo āryāvalokiteśvaro utthāya āsanādekamaṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ
K12bsu050_u:7: kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya
K12bsu050_u:8: prahasitavadano bhūtvā bhagavantametadavocat - deśayatu bhagavān prajñāpāramitāṃ
K12bsu050_u:12: ye ca sattvā mantrasādhane udyuktāsteṣāṃ cāvighnena mantrāḥ sidhyanti //
K12bsu050_u:13: atha khalu bhagavān āryāvalokiteśvarāya bodhisattvāya mahāsattvāya mahākaruṇikāya sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
K12bsu050_u:14: yastvaṃ sarvasattvānāmarthāya hitāya sukhāya pradhānāya ca dīrgharātraṃ niyuktaḥ /
K12bsu050_u:16: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru /
K12bsu050_u:20: ye ca sattvā mantrasādhane udyuktāsteṣāṃ cāvighnenaḥ mantrāḥ sidhyanti //
K12bsu050_u:21: atha khalu āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - tena hi sugata bhāṣatu sarvasattvānāmarthāya hitāya sukhāya ca //
K12bsu050_u:22: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāṃ sarvaduḥkhapramocano nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyate sma,
K12bsu050_u:23: yasya ca samādhiṃ samāpannasya bhagavata ūrṇākośavivarāllavādanekāni raśmikoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇi niścaranti sma /
K12bsu050_u:27: yāvannārakāḥ sattvāḥ * * *sarve ca buddhakṣetrāṇi ṣaḍvikāraṃ praviceluḥ /
K12bsu050_u:29: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣate sma /
K12bsu050_u:37: tadyathā - oṃ mune mune mahāmunaye svāhā //
K12bsu050_u:38: asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā lābhāt mayā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiranuprāptā /
K12bsu050_u:42: tena hi tvaṃ sarvabodhisattvānāmagrato buddhatve ca vyākṛtaḥ - bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava anāgate 'dhvani sa(mantaraśmisamu)
K12bsu050_u:43: dgataḥ śrīkūṭarājā nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
K12bsu050_u:45: ] ye idaṃ nāmadheyaṃ śroṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti likhayayiṣyanti,
K12bsu050_u:48: te sarve alpopāyena alpaśravaṇena ca tathāgatā bhaviṣyanti /
K12bsu050_u:49: tadyathā - oṃ jeya jeya padmābhe avame avame sarasaraṇi dhiridhiri devatā anupālani yuddhottāriṇi paracakranivāriṇi pūraya pūraya bhagavati sarva āśā mama ca sarvasattvānāṃ ca /
K12bsu050_u:52: iyaṃ sā kulaputra paramārthaprajñāpāramitā sarvabuddhānāṃ jananī bodhisattvamātā (bodhidātrī)
K12bsu050_u:54: sarvabuddhairapi na śaknoti asyānuśaṃsā vaktuṃ yāvatkalpakoṭiśatairapi /
K12bsu050_u:57: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - kena kāraṇena bhagavan iyaṃ svalpākṣarā prajñāpāramitā?
K12bsu050_u:60: te 'pi imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ svalpākṣarāṃ dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti likhiṣyanti likhayiṣyanti,
K12bsu050_u:62: anena kāraṇena kulaputra iyaṃ saṃkṣiptā svalpākṣarā prajñāpāramitā //
K12bsu050_u:63: evamukte āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan,
K12bsu050_u:65: yāvadeva bhagavān sarvasattvahitāya ayaṃ dharmaparyāyo bhāṣito mandapudgalānāmeva arthāya hitāya sukhāya ceti //
K12bsu050_u:68: te ca bhikṣavaste ca bodhisattvāḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti //
